title: All set backstage
creator_credit: Prahran College of Advanced Education and Paul Cox
brief_description: The name of J.C. Williamson has long been associated with the theatre in Australia. In an early Paul Cox short film, he takes an historical look at J.C. Williamson and some of the famous acts they brought to Australia. Narrated by Lady Viola Tait.
